nodes.text: Vee Naaq was a male Gran who went against his species' social structure to become a poet instead of a fluidics technician.

Vee Naaq fell in love with Cera Vixe, but her father had banned her from seeing her love. In response, Naaq hired a group of individuals to "rescue" Vixe from her father. After learning of the rescue, Cera's brother Boe Vixe offered them more to walk away from the deal.
